Name: WBTR - Welcome Back To Reality
About the game: Welcome Back To Reality is a multiplayer sandbox FPS with lots of creative freedom and gamemodes to choose from. You can play classic Deathmatch, Free For All or Capture The Flag modes with parkour elements and exciting gunplay. Do you prefer being hunted down by hordes of zombies? Then Survival might be something for you. Relax in the Sandbox mode and build detailed structures with unlimited materials and huge amouts of different objects or do military simulations with the Realism mode featuring no HUD, less health without regeneration, huge realistic maps and authentic sounds. Not enough? Make your own or download modes and maps created by the community from the Steam Workshop. WBTR comes with many tools to make modding as easy as possible. Features: Over 30 weapons 8+ unique maps Location based VOIP Easy to use in-game map editor Many drivable vehicles like cars, boats, trains and planes Straightforward in-game modding tools
